name: CoH_Subscription_Confirmation
description: Confirmation email triggered when a user subscribes at cityofhope.org/subscribe

preheader.content: You will begin to receive emails from us soon.

text.content:
"City of Hope is once again taking the lead in investigating innovations, treatments and therapies that are making big leaps forward for patients with cancer." -
 
https://www.cityofhope.org/?utm_source=sfmc&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=GlobalSubscribe_WelcomeEmail
 
Thank you for signing up to receive City of Hope emails. You will begin to receive emails from us soon.
 
In the meantime, explore some of our most popular content:
